title: Red Sparowes discography
description:
Discography of American Post-rock band Red Sparowes. Apart from the two studio albums At the Soundless Dawn and Every Red Heart Shines Toward the Sun, it includes the 2004 demo and one live album. Beware of long song names.
I decided not to include the three splits with other bands in this torrent. If there's demand I will.
Tagging and naming manually checked and adjusted.

Album list:
[2004] Demo
[2005] At The Soundless Dawn
[2006] Oh God, Lord of Vengeance, Show Yourself! 
[2006] Every Red Heart Shines Towards the Red Sun
